typeSystemDescription.name: hw1-yuerany-typesystem
typeSystemDescription.description:
The typesystem for the test item evaluator. The system specified takes in a formated text file of questions and answers and produces a precision score. For more detail on how the precision score is computed, see the project writeup.
ex: input text: 'Q who shot lincoln?' 'A 1 booth shot lincoln' 'A 0 lincoln shot booth' output: 1.0
